nav.div: Dayton School District #8損News損Emergency/School Closure Information

a.title: For school closure information please click here

h4.a: For school closure information please click here for Flash Alert

a.title: For closures in our area please click here

h4.a: For closures in our area please click here

span.span: In the event of possible school delay or closure due to inclement weather, unsafe road conditions, or other circumstances, our district will activate the School Messenger automated call system to notify you.
A decision will be made as early as possible to open schools on time, to delay the starting time, or to close schools.

span.br: Dayton School District wants you to know that in weather closure situations this winter, we will post Closed rather than a list of everything that is cancelled. If you see Closed for our district, it means that no district activities will take place and buildings will be locked. If an event or activity will go on, we will state specifically which event or activity will take place.
